title: Historic and Archaeological Heritage and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2023,
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Historic and Archaeological Heritage and
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Historic and Archaeological Heritage and 

Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2023 (Commencement) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited historic archaeological heritage miscellaneous provision act 2023 (commencement) order 2024

title: Historic and Archaeological Heritage and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2023,
heading: 2. The 31st day of May 2024 is appointed as the day on which the following
text_raw:
2. The 31st day of May 2024 is appointed as the day on which the following 
provisions of the Historic and Archaeological Heritage and Miscellaneous 
Provisions Act 2023 shall come into operation: 

(a) 

(b) 

sections 1 to 6; 

section 7 insofar as relates to the Architectural Heritage (National 
Inventory) and Historic Monuments (Miscellaneous Provisions) 
Act 1999 (other than section 5); 

(c) Part 3; 

(d) Part 8; 

(e) Part 9; 

(f) 

(g) 

(h) 

(i) 

section 172; 

section 174; 

subsections (3) and (4) of section 175 insofar as they apply to 
sections 159(4), 172 and 174; 

subsections (7) and (8) of section 175 insofar as they apply to 
section 159(2); 

(j) 

sections 178(2) and 179; 

(k) 

section 182; 

(l) 

sections 188 to 190; 

(m) Chapters 7 and 8 of Part 10; 

(n) 

sections 207, 209 and 210; 

(o) Chapters 10 and 11 of Part 10; 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 31st May, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [252] 3 

(p) 

(q) 

sections 217 and 218; 

sections 220 and 221; 

(r) Schedule 3. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 
28 May, 2024. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 
Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage.
